//wc: with comment

//Hw5-4-1 I-type testing 
//111111111111 00101 000 00000 0010011 //addi x0 x5 -1
//0000000 00100 00001 001 00000 0010011//slli x0 x1 4
//1111 1111 1111 00001 010 00000 0010011//slti x0 x1 -1(wb=0)
//1111 1111 1111 00001 011 00000 0010011//sltui x0 x1 -1(wb=1)
//00000000010000001100000000010011//xori x0 x1 4 (0x001 xor 0x100 = 0x101 = 5)
//00000000000100100101000000010011//srli x0 x4 1
//0100000 00001 00100 101 00000 0010011 //srai x0 x4 1(-16>>1 = -8)請去regfile改reg值
//00000000010000001110000000010011//ori x0 x1 4 (wb = 5)
//00000000001100101111000000010011//andi x0 x5 3 (wb = 1)

//Hw5-4-2 R-type testing
//0000000 00100 00011 000 00000 0110011//add x0 x3 x4
//0100000 00100 00011 000 00000 0110011//sub x0 x3 x4
//00000000010000011001000000110011//sll x0 x3 x4
//00000000010000011010000000110011//slt x0 x3 x4
//00000000010000011011000000110011//sltu x0 x3 x4
//00000000010000011100000000110011//xor x0 x3 x4
//00000000010000011101000000110011//srl x0 x3 x4
//01000000010000011101000000110011//sra x0 x3 x4
//0000000 00010 00001 101 00000 0110011//or x0 x1 x2
//00000000010000011111000000110011//and x0 x3 x4

//Hw5-4-6 Load/Store inst. testing
//0000 0000 0000 00000 000 00001 0000011//lb x1 x0 0xffffffdd(-35)
//0000 0000 0010 00000 001 00001 0000011//lh x1 x0 2 0xffffaabb(-21829)
//0000 0000 0000 00000 010 00001 0000011//lw x1 x0 0xaabbccdd(-1430532899)
//00000000001100000100000010000011//lbu x1 x0 3 0x000000aa(170)
//0000 0000 0010 00000 101 00001 0000011//lhu x1 x0 2 0x0000ccdd()
//00000000000100000000000000100011//sb x1 x0 0()
//0000000 00001 00000 001 00000 0100011//sh x1 x0 2()
//00000000000100000010000000100011//sw x1 x0 0()

//Hw5-4-8 B-type testing
//00000000000100001000110001100011//beq x1 x1 24
//0 000000 00000 00001 001 0101 0 1100011//bne x1 x1 10
//0 000000 00010 00001 100 1000 0 1100011 //blt x1 x2 16
//00000000000000001101011001100011//bge x1 x0 12
//00000000000100001110010001100011//bltu x1 x1 8
//0 000000 00010 00001 111 0010 0 1100011//bgeu x1 x2 4 x1=-36864 x2=2 jmp=true

//Hw5-4-9 J-type testing
//1 1111101100 1 11111111 00000 1101111//jal x0 -20
//000000010000 00100 000 00000 1100111//jalr x0 x4 16
